original_text: It shall be eaten the same day you offer it or on the day after, and anything left over until the third day shall be burned up with fire.
korean_text: 그 제물은 드리는 날과 이튿날에 먹고 셋째 날까지 남았거든 불사르라

sentences.original_text: It shall be eaten the same day you offer it
and anything left over until the third day
shall be burned up with fire
